title: Innovative Legal Education Program Based on Online Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic legal knowledge and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: Online real-time collaborative learning process for current elementary school teachers participating via smartphones.

learning_goals: Students can analyze three legal issue cases that may arise in elementary education settings using online collaboration tools.
Learners can effectively apply role distribution and collaborative communication strategies in virtual team projects with over 80% proficiency.
Participants can demonstrate a legal reasoning-based decision-making process in a digital collaboration environment at least twice.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
